title: Best Used Cars In The World For 20 Grand -- /ROAD TESTAMENT
description: It's the last of the BEST USED CARS trilogy. Mike Spinelli and Matt Hardigree, editor-in-chief of Jalopnik, reveal DRIVE's (and viewers') picks for best used sports cars for 20 grand. Which ones did we miss?
